svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - October 19 2024
October 19 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
October 19, 2024" date: "2024-10-18"
Eth News and Links
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
â€¢ Consensus layer focused protocol call (ACDC #144): Pectra upgrade: Spec refinement discussions Blob increase: Base blob increase
proposal presented: target 5, max 8 blobs engine_getBlobsV1 initial results : bandwidth reduced for download but increased for upload
EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL: makes changing blob count easier, consensus layer teams support scheduling for inclusion,
review on next week's call with execution layer teams EIP7783 controlled gas limit increase EIP7782 reduce slot time to 8s : 2-4s would be
more attractive option, needs more analysis, could conflict with future potential upgrades
â€¢ Pectra upgrade: Spec refinement discussions Blob increase: Base blob increase proposal presented: target 5, max 8 blobs
engine_getBlobsV1 initial results : bandwidth reduced for download but increased for upload EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL:
makes changing blob count easier, consensus layer teams support scheduling for inclusion, review on next week's call with execution layer
teams
Pectra upgrade:
â€¢ Spec refinement discussions
Spec refinement discussions
â€¢ Blob increase: Base blob increase proposal presented: target 5, max 8 blobs engine_getBlobsV1 initial results : bandwidth reduced for
download but increased for upload EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL: makes changing blob count easier, consensus layer teams
support scheduling for inclusion, review on next week's call with execution layer teams
Blob increase:
â€¢ Base blob increase proposal presented: target 5, max 8 blobs
Base blob increase proposal presented: target 5, max 8 blobs
â€¢ engine_getBlobsV1 initial results : bandwidth reduced for download but increased for upload
engine_getBlobsV1 initial results : bandwidth reduced for download but increased for upload
â€¢ EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL: makes changing blob count easier, consensus layer teams support scheduling for inclusion,
review on next week's call with execution layer teams
â€¢ EIP7783 controlled gas limit increase
EIP7783 controlled gas limit increase
â€¢ EIP7782 reduce slot time to 8s : 2-4s would be more attractive option, needs more analysis, could conflict with future potential
upgrades
EIP7782 reduce slot time to 8s : 2-4s would be more attractive option, needs more analysis, could conflict with future potential upgrades
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-4 : launched; 20% offline (10% Grandine & 10% Erigon)
Pectra-devnet-4 : launched; 20% offline (10% Grandine & 10% Erigon)
â€¢ Weekly testing call #9 : fusaka-devnet-0 planned for ~2 weeks time & ssz-devnet-0 launched
Weekly testing call #9 : fusaka-devnet-0 planned for ~2 weeks time & ssz-devnet-0 launched
â€¢ EIP2537 BLS precompiles: Feedback wanted on planned EIP2537 usage & need for subgroup checks EIP2537 BLS breakout : discussed removing
subgroup checks & precompiles are underpriced
EIP2537 BLS precompiles:
â€¢ Feedback wanted on planned EIP2537 usage & need for subgroup checks
Feedback wanted on planned EIP2537 usage & need for subgroup checks
â€¢ EIP2537 BLS breakout : discussed removing subgroup checks & precompiles are underpriced
EIP2537 BLS breakout : discussed removing subgroup checks & precompiles are underpriced
Fusaka (Osaka + Fulu) upgrade
â€¢ PeerDAS breakout #10 : continuing to debug peerdas-devnet-3, unfinalized for over a week
PeerDAS breakout #10 : continuing to debug peerdas-devnet-3, unfinalized for over a week
â€¢ EOF implementers call #60 : discussed ERC721 support using EXTCODE/HASCODE, EXT*CALL return codes and EOFCREATE hashing
EOF implementers call #60 : discussed ERC721 support using EXTCODE/HASCODE, EXT*CALL return codes and EOFCREATE hashing
Layer 1
â€¢ Giulio Rebuffo (Erigon): proposal to raise the gas limit via EIP7783
Giulio Rebuffo (Erigon): proposal to raise the gas limit via EIP7783
â€¢ ProbeLab Hermes : GossipSub listener & tracer for libp2p
ProbeLab Hermes : GossipSub listener & tracer for libp2p

Ephemery testnet incentives for genesis validators, infrastructure & client implementations
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 28% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.4% Any
client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.4%
Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.4%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Client Releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Besu v24.10.0 : adds support for blobs in multiple transactions to engine_getBlobsV1 and Ephemery testnet support Prysm
v5.1.2 : hotfix for v5.1.1 to recover from panic; v5.1.1 : experimental state enabled by default and adds IDONTWANT support
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Besu v24.10.0 : adds support for blobs in multiple transactions to engine_getBlobsV1 and Ephemery testnet support
Besu v24.10.0 : adds support for blobs in multiple transactions to engine_getBlobsV1 and Ephemery testnet support
â€¢ Prysm v5.1.2 : hotfix for v5.1.1 to recover from panic; v5.1.1 : experimental state enabled by default and adds IDONTWANT support
Prysm v5.1.2 : hotfix for v5.1.1 to recover from panic; v5.1.1 : experimental state enabled by default and adds IDONTWANT support
â€¢ Execution layer: Nethermind v1.29.1 : improved memory usage on Linux and improved OP Stack sync Teku v24.10.2 : hotfix for v24.10.x
preventing startup on Windows
Execution layer:
â€¢ Nethermind v1.29.1 : improved memory usage on Linux and improved OP Stack sync
Nethermind v1.29.1 : improved memory usage on Linux and improved OP Stack sync
â€¢ Teku v24.10.2 : hotfix for v24.10.x preventing startup on Windows
Teku v24.10.2 : hotfix for v24.10.x preventing startup on Windows
Layer 2
â€¢ World Chain (OP Stack rollup) open to public
World Chain (OP Stack rollup) open to public
â€¢ Fuel Ignition (FuelVM) live, UTXO based
Fuel Ignition (FuelVM) live, UTXO based
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7788 : Dynamic target blob count Informational EIP7790 : Parameter recommendations for
controlled gas limit increase strategy
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
â€¢ EIP7788 : Dynamic target blob count
EIP7788 : Dynamic target blob count
â€¢ Informational EIP7790 : Parameter recommendations for controlled gas limit increase strategy
Informational EIP7790 : Parameter recommendations for controlled gas limit increase strategy
â€¢ RIPs (rollup improvement proposals): RIP7789 : Cross rollup contingent transactions
RIPs (rollup improvement proposals):
â€¢ RIP7789 : Cross rollup contingent transactions

â€¢ ERC7786 : Cross-chain messaging gateway
ERC7786 : Cross-chain messaging gateway

Stuff for developers
â€¢ Underhanded Solidity contest : Gerard Persoon solo winner with fallback from transient storage
Underhanded Solidity contest : Gerard Persoon solo winner with fallback from transient storage
â€¢ OpenZeppelin Contracts v5.1 : adds P256 & RSA signature validation; MerkleTree, CircularBuffer & Heap data structures; StorageSlot,
ReentrancyGuardTransient & SlotDerivation utilities; updated Arrays, Base64, CREATE2, Strings & Math
OpenZeppelin Contracts v5.1 : adds P256 & RSA signature validation; MerkleTree, CircularBuffer & Heap data structures; StorageSlot,
â€¢ Guide to invariant testing using Recon Builder for scaffolding a Foundry project
Guide to invariant testing using Recon Builder for scaffolding a Foundry project
â€¢ Echidna v2.2.5 : adds Cancun support, warns if an assert isnâ€™t hit in assert mode, adds cheat codes and collects coverage during
deployment
Echidna v2.2.5 : adds Cancun support, warns if an assert isnâ€™t hit in assert mode, adds cheat codes and collects coverage during
â€¢ Pcaversaccio white hat frontrunning : Bash script using Foundry cast & chisel to secure funds from compromised wallets
Pcaversaccio white hat frontrunning : Bash script using Foundry cast & chisel to secure funds from compromised wallets
Security
â€¢ Radiant Capital $50M exploit on Arbitrum & BSC via compromised devices of 3/11 signers; revoke approvals on all chains
Ecosystem
â€¢ Vitalik on Ethereum improvements being considered: Proof of Stake (the Merge) : single slot finality, 1 ETH staking, single secret
leader election, faster transaction confirmations, 51% attack recovery, increasing quorum threshold for finality and quantum resistance
Scaling (the Surge) : data availability sampling, data compression, generalized Plasma, maturing L2 proof systems, cross-L2
interoperability and scaling L1 execution
Vitalik on Ethereum improvements being considered:
â€¢ Proof of Stake (the Merge) : single slot finality, 1 ETH staking, single secret leader election, faster transaction confirmations, 51%
attack recovery, increasing quorum threshold for finality and quantum resistance
Proof of Stake (the Merge) : single slot finality, 1 ETH staking, single secret leader election, faster transaction confirmations, 51%
â€¢ Scaling (the Surge) : data availability sampling, data compression, generalized Plasma, maturing L2 proof systems, cross-L2
â€¢ Propose Devcon satellite events
Propose Devcon satellite events
Job Listings
â€¢ Sigma Prime is hiring Rust developers and security engineers. Remote roles !
Sigma Prime is hiring Rust developers and security engineers. Remote roles !
â€¢ Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
â€¢ Nethermind: Sr Dev (Rust, Go) & Sr Contract Auditor (Rust)
Nethermind: Sr Dev (Rust, Go) & Sr Contract Auditor (Rust)
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 5.3 to 111.8 gwei, 16.4 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.3 gwei 6k ETH net issuance this week

6k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,436 - $2,671, currently $2,641, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,436 - $2,671, currently $2,641, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.039 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.039 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ dGEN1 (mobile device): runs ethOS, ships 2025, pre-order via mint on Base
